topic.title: People of €urope are happy about Bruxelles bomb campaign
topic.body:
Very much like some bombings in Syria, it was absolutely necessary to bomb Bruxelles.

Everyone in Europe is happy that some Bruxelles enemies were killed. Keep bombing Bruxells, dear friends! Stop the €U crime. Destroy €U Bruxelles dictatorship!
